description:
Section 73 application (minor material amendment) to vary condition 2 (approved plans) of planning permission ref: P120282 dated 02/04/2012 for the: â€˜Erection of a single storey rear extension on top of existing two storey rear extension [incorporating retention of part of existing terrace at this level] plus associated works and alterations'. The minor material amendments are:
A] To install a glazed door to provide maintenance access to the green roof and glazed balustrades around the roof edge.
decision_conditions:
This proposal has been approved following consideration of all the relevant policies in the Development Plan (London Plan 2011, Islington Core Strategy 2011 and Islington Unitary Development Plan 2002), National Planning Policy Framework 2012 and other material considerations.

- This decision was made under delegated authority;

-    The proposed development is considered be acceptable in terms of its design and appearance. The proposed extension and balustrade does not have a detrimental impact on the character and appearance of the host building and the wider Roseberry Avenue Conservation Area. The proposal accords with policy 7.6 of the London Plan 2011, policies CS8 and CS9 of the Islington Core Strategy 2011 and policies D3, D4, D11, D24 and D28 of the Islington Unitary Development Plan 2002.

- The resulting development is not considered to have an unacceptable impact on neighbouring residential amenity in terms of light, privacy, outlook and visual amenity.  The development is therefore in accordance with policy, D3 of the Islington Unitary Development Plan 2002.
